name: Folding Plate
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Armor/Specific Armors/Folding Plate

Construction.Requirements: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, instant summons

sections.body: This item normally looks like a heavy steel brooch or cloak clasp, often depicting a heavy helm or sturdy shield. On command, the brooch transforms in a clatter of metallic plates and panels to instantly cover the wearer in a complete suit of +1 full plate, with the design of the brooch displayed on the armor's breastplate. The same command word causes the armor to transform into the brooch. The brooch only transforms if the wearer's armor slot is unoccupied, thus it won't work if the wearer is already armored.
